name: part_008
file: tmp_【3D CONCERT】KIARA & FRIENDS： H!P Cover Song Spring Concert #HPmeetsHoloEN [jjLLByDa3Xc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: MC segment featuring IRyS, Takanashi Kiara, and Mori Calliope. They discuss IRyS's independence and a humorous incident with her manager before Calliope and IRyS depart for a 'walk'.

subtitles.original: ...stuff. Does it- has it turned out we sang this song to IRyS?
subtitles.english: ...stuff. Does it- has it turned out we sang this song to IRyS?

subtitles.original: You have to be independent IRyS.
subtitles.english: You have to be independent IRyS.

subtitles.original: Teaching her a lesson.
subtitles.english: Teaching her a lesson.

subtitles.original: I am so independent. I did not have my
subtitles.english: I am so independent. I did not have my

subtitles.original: manager feed me medicine right before this.
subtitles.english: manager feed me medicine right before this.

subtitles.original: I saw that! I saw that!
subtitles.english: I saw that! I saw that!

subtitles.original: I saw that. I heard it.
subtitles.english: I saw that. I heard it.

subtitles.original: And you were like, "Can you put it right into-"
subtitles.english: And you were like, "Can you put it right into-"

subtitles.original: We believe you.
subtitles.english: We believe you.

subtitles.original: That sounds weird. Oh my god.
subtitles.english: That sounds weird. Oh my god.

subtitles.original: Anyway, we will continue teaching her some
subtitles.english: Anyway, we will continue teaching her some

subtitles.original: lessons about independence, right? Okay.
subtitles.english: lessons about independence, right? Okay.

subtitles.original:
She can't be independent for now though, so we're
going to go for a walk in the forest together.
subtitles.english:
She can't be independent for now though, so we're
going to go for a walk in the forest together.

subtitles.original: Take me! Take me independent girl!
subtitles.english: Take me! Take me independent girl!

subtitles.original: Okay, I'll take you.
subtitles.english: Okay, I'll take you.

subtitles.original: Thanks for the invite, Kiara! It's been fun!
subtitles.english: Thanks for the invite, Kiara! It's been fun!

subtitles.original: Bye bye! I'll teach you the ways.
subtitles.english: Bye bye! I'll teach you the ways.

subtitles.original:
Alright, come on IRyS, we're going to
go for a walk now.
subtitles.english:
Alright, come on IRyS, we're going to
go for a walk now.

subtitles.original: Oh my god. Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Oh my god. Bye bye!

subtitles.original: Yeah. Well, that was independent girls right there.
subtitles.english: Yeah. Well, that was independent girls right there.

subtitles.original: But going on, moving on,
subtitles.english: But going on, moving on,

subtitles.original: I think I'll put my microphone away so I can
subtitles.english: I think I'll put my microphone away so I can

subtitles.original: have a little bit more freedom with my arms
subtitles.english: have a little bit more freedom with my arms

subtitles.original: and maybe I'll attach some LEDs to this outfit.
subtitles.english: and maybe I'll attach some LEDs to this outfit.

subtitles.original: Got to switch some batteries.
subtitles.english: Got to switch some batteries.

subtitles.original: So, I'll see you in a minute!
subtitles.english: So, I'll see you in a minute!

subtitles.original:
Love take it all
Lyrics, Music: つんく♂
subtitles.english:
Love take it all
Lyrics, Music: Tsunku♂

subtitles.original: 思い出したくない 恋もしてきたわ
subtitles.english: I've been in loves I don't want to remember

subtitles.original: 若気の至りってやつね
subtitles.english: The rashness of youth, you know?

subtitles.original: それでも後悔は しないのが私流
subtitles.english: Even so, not having regrets is my style

subtitles.original: 自分が生きてきた道だから
subtitles.english: Because it's the path I've walked

subtitles.original: 嘘をついてまでして 体裁取り繕って
subtitles.english: Going so far as to lie to keep up appearances

subtitles.original: 逆に疲れないんだろうか
subtitles.english: Don't you just get tired instead?

subtitles.original: 夢が 夢が 夢が 弾む
subtitles.english: Dreams, dreams, dreams are bouncing

subtitles.original: このまま引き下がらない
subtitles.english: I won't back down like this

subtitles.original: 次の扉開けば 未来が見える
subtitles.english: If I open the next door, I can see the future

subtitles.original: ほら シンプルなキスくらいじゃ ごまかされないよ
subtitles.english: Look, I won't be fooled by just a simple kiss

subtitles.original: 次のチャンス掴めば さらなるチャンス
subtitles.english: If I grab the next chance, even more chances

subtitles.original: ほら 複雑な青春の 糸を解すように
subtitles.english: Look, like untangling the threads of complex youth

subtitles.original: Love take it all
subtitles.english: Love take it all

subtitles.original: 好きでもないのに ただ何となく
subtitles.english: Even though I didn't love them, just somehow

subtitles.original: 付き合ったりもしたけれど
subtitles.english: I've dated people like that too

subtitles.original: 起き上がれないほど 高熱出した日も
subtitles.english: Even on days I had a fever so high I couldn't get up

subtitles.original: 会いに行きたい恋もしたよ
subtitles.english: I've been in love where I wanted to go see them

subtitles.original: 時が 時が 時が 刻む
subtitles.english: Time, time, time ticks on

subtitles.original: 昨日にはもう戻れない
subtitles.english: I can't go back to yesterday anymore

subtitles.original: 次の扉開けば 未来が見える
subtitles.english: If I open the next door, I can see the future

subtitles.original: ほら 映画にでてきそうな セリフじゃ足りない
subtitles.english: Look, lines that look like they're from a movie aren't enough

subtitles.original: 次のチャンス掴めば さらなるチャンス
subtitles.english: If I grab the next chance, even more chances

subtitles.original: ほら 誰もまだ通ってない 新たなる扉
subtitles.english: Look, a new door that no one has passed through yet

subtitles.original: Love take it all
subtitles.english: Love take it all

subtitles.english: If I open the next door, I can see the future

subtitles.original: ほら シンプルなキスくらいじゃ ごまかされないよ
subtitles.english: Look, I won't be fooled by just a simple kiss
